channel.title: Client Background
channel.description:
Well...
I have this problem about the background of my client
i don't get it You take a pic and then u cut it and rotate it in paint be how That i dont understand
so i made boring nothing background rofl
So if anyone wanna help me how i make nice background + loginbox would be nice
thx :D

item.title: Client Background
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

just make a background and cut and rotate it in the center and your good to go…

Read full topic
